ygData.subject: Re: Fighting at Maxi City
ygData.msgSnippet: The blast threw AzureBlade back. His armor, already battered, took more damage. He had not been in the immediate radius, but it shook him nonetheless.

The blast threw AzureBlade back. His armor, already battered, took 
more damage. He had not been in the immediate radius, but it shook him 
nonetheless.
AzureBlade: AAARGHHHHHHHH!!!!!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: My post for Maximal City still stands. However I shall add a 
bit.
> 
> BIC: The City's shield's were destroyes as well as external guns and
> other weapons. Any bot within 20 feet of the base should be 
destroyed or
> severly damaged.
